src:
Misi Revans PSS Sleman di Laga Kontra PSIS Semarang
01 Nov 2019, 11:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSS Sleman mengusung misi revans ketika menghadapi PSIS Semarang pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Super Elang Jawa ingin membalas kekalahan pada putaran pertama.
Pada putaran pertama Liga 1 2019 lalu, PSS kalah dengan skor 1-3 dari PSIS. Dave Mustaine dan kawan-kawan kalah ketika bermain di hadapan suporternya di Stadion Muguwoharjo, Sleman.
PSS Sleman menyadari bahwa PSIS Semarang adalah tim yang sulit dikalahkan. Meskipun, pertandingan tersebut akan menjadi laga tandang rasa kandang karena digelar di Stadion Maguwoharjo.
"Kalau masalah revans, kita jelas pengin, dan kita harus berusaha, tapi bagaimana pun PSIS juga tim yang solid," kata pelatih PSS Sleman, Seto Nurdiyantoro, Jumat (01/11/2019).
"Di beberapa pertandingan away mereka juga mampu memgambil poin penuh," imbuh mantan juru taktik PSIM Yogyakarta tersebut.
Terlebih, di kubu PSIS juga sudah mengalami banyak perubahan komposiso dari putaran pertama lalu. Seperti adanya pergantian pelatih hingga merapatnya beberapa pemain anyar.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
PSS Sleman Revans Mission in PSIS Counter Counter Semarang
Nov 01 2019, 11:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSS Sleman carries the revans mission when facing PSIS Semarang in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 which is broadcast by Indosiar, Saturday (02/11/2019). The Javanese Super Hawk wants to avenge defeat in the first round.
In the first round of League 1 in 2019, PSS lost 1-3 to PSIS. Dave Mustaine and his friends lost when playing in front of supporters at the Muguwoharjo Stadium, Sleman.
PSS Sleman realizes that PSIS Semarang is a team that is hard to beat. Although, the match will be an away game because it was held at the Maguwoharjo Stadium.
"If the revans problem, we clearly want, and we must try, but after all PSIS is also a solid team," said Sleman PSS coach, Seto Nurdiyantoro, Friday (01/11/2019).
"In some away matches they were also able to take full points," added the former PSIM Yogyakarta tactician.
Moreover, in the PSIS camp also experienced many changes in composition from the first round ago. As there is a change of coach to close several new players.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
